By the Queene. The Queenes most excellent Maiestie in her princely nature, considering how dangerous a matter it is by continuance of the faire called Bartholomew faire ... Proclamations. 1593-08-06 England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I) Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1593]
Publication date from STC. Forbidding retail trade at Bartholomew fair because of plague. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
